page.title: 08A special Farm Near Perth
page.content: This farm has to be seen to be believed! Balcraig Farm exists to supply Balcraig Hotel with the best possible free range products. Geese,ducks,hens and,bantams,turkeys, Guinea fowls and even Peacocks all roaming free about the farm!Ewes with their lambs,Goats and kids,Cows and calves and even horses for the hotel guests to ride-all in the fields.For obvious reasons the bull,the wild boar,the wild sows and their piglets are safely inside electric fences. It's a very old fashioned farm and the farmer is rather old fashioned too! It's a 5am to 9pm job seven days a week and he loves the life so much that he never wants a holiday! With just about every farm animal you could think of this is every childs idea of what a farm should be. It's Incredible!
